item.title: How to manage holidays?
item.description: Under “Store holiday” feature all the holidays can be managed. You can Add, edit or delete holidays. Process to add holidays Go to “master management” Go to “Store Holiday” Click “New” Fill in all the necessary details and click “Add” On clicking “Add”, holiday will be added. Process to edit holidays Go to “Master management” Go to “Store Holiday” Select the holiday to be edited and make required changes. Then click “Edit” New changes has been saved.

item.title: Do past holidays automatically get removed?
item.description: As this is a manual process, a holiday doesn’t get removed automatically.
